hints.label: prob-mean-field-qsd-regularity
hints.title: Problem 1: Regularity of Mean-Field QSD
hints.content:
477: :label: prob-mean-field-qsd-regularity
478: 
479: **Question**: Does $\rho_\infty$ satisfy:
480: 1. $\rho_\infty \in C^k(\Omega)$ for $k \ge 2$?
481: 2. $\int (|x|^p + |v|^p) \rho_\infty < \infty$ for all $p$?
482: 3. $I(\rho_\infty | \rho_{\text{ref}}) < \infty$?
483: 
484: **Current status**: Existence/uniqueness proven ([06_propagation_chaos.md](06_propagation_chaos.md)), regularity not established.

hints.label: prob-revival-kl
hints.title: Problem 2: KL-Properties of Revival Operator
hints.content:
490: :label: prob-revival-kl
491: 
492: **Question**: Is $\mathcal{R}$ KL-non-expansive?
493: 
494: **Current status**: Finite-N cloning preserves LSI ([10_kl_convergence.md](10_kl_convergence.md)). Mean-field analog unknown.
495: 
496: **Approach**: Model $\mathcal{R}$ as optimal transport or Bayes update.

hints.label: prob-adaptive-ellipticity-mean-field
hints.title: Problem 3: Uniform Ellipticity of Adaptive Diffusion
hints.content:
502: :label: prob-adaptive-ellipticity-mean-field
503: 
504: **Question**: Along trajectories $\rho_t$, does $\Sigma_{\text{reg}}[\rho_t]$ remain uniformly elliptic?
505: 
506: $$
507: c_{\min} I \preceq (\nabla^2 V_{\text{fit}}[\rho_t] + \epsilon_\Sigma I)^{-1} \preceq c_{\max} I
508: $$
509: 
510: **Current status**: Finite-N uniform ellipticity by construction. Mean-field requires PDE-based proof.

hints.label: prob-n-uniform-lsi
hints.title: Problem 4: N-Uniformity of LSI Constants
hints.content:
516: :label: prob-n-uniform-lsi
517: 
518: **Question**: Does the finite-N LSI constant from [10_kl_convergence.md](10_kl_convergence.md) remain bounded as $N \to \infty$?
519: 
520: $$
521: \sup_{N \ge 2} C_{\text{LSI}}^{(N)} < \infty
522: $$
523: 
524: **Why it matters**: If yes, could prove mean-field LSI directly by passing to limit (Strategy F). Much cleaner proof.
525: 
526: **Current status**: Unknown. N-uniform LSI is rare but would be ideal.
